snippet: The Green Mountain Project performed Monteverdi’s Vespers of the Blessed Virgin at the Church of St. Jean Baptiste.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by the Green Mountain Project at the Church of St Jean Baptiste.
lead_paragraph: The Green Mountain Project performed Monteverdi’s Vespers of the Blessed Virgin at the Church of St. Jean Baptiste.

headline.seo: ‘Vespers of 1640’ at Church of St. Jean Baptiste - Review
headline.main: Presenting Sacred Works in a Style From the 1600s
